Product ManagerA product manager is a tech professional who manages the design of the roadmap for an entire product. Starting with the fundamental features of assessing quality checks, deciding on customer base, and handling the prospects. The product manager controls everything related to a product.This role demands influential leadership skills and clear communication. In addition to this, proper knowledge of the industry is a necessary condition to understanding the concept of the product.Highlights of this Job:2. Data ScientistA data scientist must be skilled in the scientific analysis and interpretation of big data. A large collection of information or raw data is called "Big Data" when it cannot be analysed using conventional data processing procedures.The data scientist will now enter the picture. Working on collecting, cleaning, analysing, and interpreting complex data is the responsibility of a professional expert who has a solid understanding of the most recent advancements in data structures, algorithms, machine learning, etc., as well as programming languages like Python, Java, C++, etc.Key Highlights of the Job:3. Data EngineerA data engineer is a specialist who works on building, and designing the data infrastructures or pipelines to interpret and analyse the data.A data engineer needs to be knowledgeable in the field of technology and have expertise in skills like System Architect, database design and configuration, programming, interface and sensor configuration, and distributed systems.Every 6 out of 10th people are using the Internet everyday. Imagine the amount of data one can procure for analysis. Such procurement and analysis are not done through paper and pen. It requires technology and professionals who understand it. Therefore, there is a high demand for this job role.Highlights of this Job:4. Software development engineer-A software development engineer is a technical person who is in charge of creating applications and software programs that can be run on different platforms and operating systems.They are not the experts who just code instead. They are experts who work comprehensively on the operations and development of applications and programs, by providing analytical, strategic solutions and managing errors aligning with the needs of the organisation/business.There is a great demand for this job profile amongst many big tech companies like TCS, Uber, Amazon, etc.Key Highlights of the Job Role:5. Software ArchitectA development professional who designs, tests, and manages software solutions for software systems is known as Software Architect. They work with high-level designing skills, codes, methodologies, and processes to configure any software-related issues.They are great leaders, with designing and programming skills and work and understand both the parties of the business as well as the clients.Highlights of this Job:6. Cloud ArchitectA Cloud Architect is in control of the design, architecture, implementation, and maintenance of the cloud computing components.Cloud computing is broad network access that allows the delivery of services like storage, networking, database, servers, and analytics over the internet without any human interaction. It is one of the trendiest and on-demand technologies. It is one of the reasons why cloud architects are included in the highest-paid software jobs in India.Highlights of the Role:7. DevOps EngineerDevOps Engineer is an IT professional who handles the development as well as the operations part of the application. This job profile is part of the full life cycle of a software application from development to deployment.DevOps have foundational knowledge about the DevOps technology and process like continuous integration, monitoring, and logging, communication and collaboration, infrastructure as code, continuous delivery, etc. This tech role is significant to employers as it bridges the gap between the siloed departments of development and operations.Highlights of the Job:8. IoT ArchitectIoT or known as the Internet of Things. IoT is one of the most popular and in-demand technologies in the IT sector. It brings a transformation in terms of sharing and communicating data. As solutions architects, they oversee the use and practical approach of this technology as a whole.A significant position in the company, that facilitates business-oriented queries and finds the solutions for them.Highlights of the Job Profile:9. Blockchain EngineerBlockchain is the leading technology for the Banking, Financial Services and Insurance Sector. Blockchain technologies have opened up infinite possibilities for aspirants as well as employers.Key Highlights of this Job Profile:10. Artificial Intelligence (AI) EngineerAn AI engineer is a technical professional who works with Artificial Technology to design and develop initiatives for different operations like analysing, storing, or creating applications. They work on managing the AI systems for efficient functioning.Artificial Intelligence is the future of technology. Every industry is using these modern-day technologies for expanding its commercial horizons. Answer: There are different jobs in IT that pay you a good salary depending on your abilities. One thing to keep in mind is that the salary may vary based on your line of work. Here are some of theAverage salary:A Data Scientist is responsible for identifying the data-analytics challenges that create the most prospects for the company. They choose the necessary data sets and variables. They bringThere are different jobs in IT that pay you a good salary depending on your abilities. One thing to keep in mind is that the salary may vary based on your line of work. Here are some of theAverage salary:A Data Scientist is responsible for identifying the data-analytics challenges that create the most prospects for the company. They choose the necessary data sets and variables. They bring together vast numbers of structured and unstructured data from different sources. They clean and validate the data to ensure that it is reliable, total, and consistent. They also develop and implement models and algorithms to mine massive data sets. They identify patterns and trends by analyzing the data. Data Scientists seek solutions and opportunities by interpreting data.Average salary:The Internet of Things (IoT) Solutions Architect is responsible for making practical uses and solutions for the internet of things. To make process creation simpler, the IoT technologies architect normally collaborates with engineers and salespeople. They oversee the strategy for designing and implementing IoT solutions. They require strong programming skills, knowledge of Machine Learning, and an understanding of hardware design and architecture. They lead and engage in architecture and design activities and also assist in the creation of an overall IoT ecosystem interaction.Average salary:A Big Data Engineer is responsible for data management. This involves building a data landscape for data scientists by leveraging accessible data and technologies. They are responsible for data integration into central analysis infrastructure and deciding which technologies are suitable for this. Their expertise is not restricted to the data available in the organization and its storage locations. They are also responsible for determining which technologies are suitable for this.Average salary:A Software Architect is responsible for the design and development of software systems and applications. They can design software customized to a client's unique requirements or consumer products such as games or desktop applications. They are the process's top decision-makers, deciding on everything from design decisions to technological requirements like platforms and coding standards. Software Architects typically supervise and collaborate with other members of the production team, such as programmers. They are the project managers for software development programs, but they also report to upper management.Average salary:A Blockchain Engineer is responsible for using a new form of technology to build and incorporate digital solutions for companies. Information can be replicated and exchanged freely over the Internet using blockchain technology without being copied. The data isn't held in a centralized location. They work for companies that offer data services and advise on technology. These engineers must be able to determine a company's technical requirements and design software to satisfy those requirements. They develop and implement accelerators and assets.Average salary:A DevOps Engineer is responsible for developing and deploying new development technologies and infrastructure. They identify and communicate the needs of stakeholders to developers, and collaborate on ways to simplify and enhance development and release processes. They ensure that systems are safe and stable against cybersecurity threats by checking and reviewing code written by others and evaluating the reports. They identify and develop software upgrades and ‘fixes' for technical issues.Average salary:A Cloud Architect is responsible for designing a company's computing strategy. Cloud adoption strategies, cloud application design, cloud management, and cloud monitoring are all part of this strategy. Support for application architecture and implementation in cloud environments are also included among the additional responsibilities. When designing and implementing dynamic cloud technologies, this specialist uses comprehensive knowledge of the company's cloud infrastructure and platform.Average salary:A full-stack developer is responsible for maintaining technical expertise and skills to turn a design into a finished product. They have a clear understanding of how the project works from top to bottom and can predict future issues. Although both the front end and back end need a substantial amount of expertise, a full stack developer is fluent in handling the software development process. They can work with various kinds of databases, programming languages, and many more. Along with these also learn about

currently the highest paid professionals in the current industry and grabs an average salary of $150K/annum.Big Data Hadoop Developer.Today, data is everywhere, and making good use of analytics out of the data is the need of every organization to understand customers’ behavior or certain business patterns to achieve growth and establish a good bond with the customer.So, the Job role of a Hadoop developer majorly involves coding and they are Basically software programmers only, who are Adept at coming up with the design concepts used for creating extensive software applications and without expertise.DevOps EngineerTheir main job role is to understand the entire software development lifecycle with an understanding of several automation tools so as to develop the CI/CD Pipelines.There is Answer: A2A.I think it is worth doing a masters in food science/ food process engineering abroad. I have been recently preparing to apply to foreign universities as I’m completing my degree in May/June 2021. My top priority is Canada, 2nd is Germany/ New Zealand. You cannot sustain in Germany without knowing their language, I tried learning but failed to do so. Then I dropped the option of Germany it just didn’t work out for me. I chose Canada because it has better PR options, reasonable tuition fees and after graduation a good pay for food engineers/quality technicians.There are two kinds of degree fA2A.I think it is worth doing a masters in food science/ food process engineering abroad. I have been recently preparing to apply to foreign universities as I’m completing my degree in May/June 2021. My top priority is Canada, 2nd is Germany/ New Zealand. You cannot sustain in Germany without knowing their language, I tried learning but failed to do so. Then I dropped the option of Germany it just didn’t work out for me. I chose Canada because it has better PR options, reasonable tuition fees and after graduation a good pay for food engineers/quality technicians.There are two kinds of degree for food science in Canada. Research based/Course based. In research based degree, you have to complete a thesis and the duration would be of two years. In course based, normally it has a research project and the duration would be an year or an year and a half. This kind of degree would be given as M.Sc(Food Science).There is also an another option who have completed their Bachelors in Engineering (Food Science and Technology/Food Process Engineering). There are masters in Biological Engineering and Biosystems Engineering in Canada where you can choose specialized courses choosing common engineering courses and food engineering courses. Some are research based and some are course based.I have also done some research for countries like USA, UK, New Zealand, Germany and Australia. I f you wanna know more please DM me. I would reply within a day or two.

Answer: Grammatical mistakes can be easy to make. But fear not! Our team at Grammarly has compiled a handy list of common grammatical errors to help make your writing accurate, clear, and professional.Ambiguous (“Squinting”) modifiersA squinting modifier is a misplaced modifier that, because of its location in a sentence, could modify either the phrase that precedes it or the one that follows it. In the example sentence, is the subject listening to music slowly or slowly gettGrammatical mistakes can be easy to make. But fear not! Our team at Grammarly has compiled a handy list of common grammatical errors to help make your writing accurate, clear, and professional.Ambiguous (“Squinting”) modifiersA squinting modifier is a misplaced modifier that, because of its location in a sentence, could modify either the phrase that precedes it or the one that follows it. In the example sentence, is the subject listening to music slowly or slowly getting a headache? To correct a squinting modifier, move its position in the sentence to clarify to the reader which word you intend to modify.Misuse of lie/layIf you plan to place or put an object somewhere, such as a plate on a table, you should use “lay.” If you intend to stretch out on a bed for a nap, you should use “lie.” The verb “lie” is an intransitive verb, which means it does not need an object. The transitive verb “lay” requires an object.It may take some getting used to this “lay” or “lie” business; after all, misuse of these verbs is common. But if you remember to lay down your fork before you’re full, then you won’t have to lie down later from overeating.Comma splicesHe was very hungry, so he ate a whole pizza.To splice means to connect or join. When a writer joins two independent sentences with a comma instead of separating them with a period or coordinating conjunction, that’s a comma splice.The comma has its jobs to do, but connecting two independent sentences isn’t one of them. Besides, the period gets testy when his sister, the comma, steals his thunder. Periods have their jobs, and so do commas, but never the twain shall meet—unless it’s in the form of a semicolon. Semicolons can also take the place of a coordinating conjunction, such as “and,” “but,” or “so,” among others.Run-on sentencesRun-on sentences, also known as fused sentences, occur when two complete sentences are squashed together without using a coordinating conjunction or proper punctuation, such as a period or a semicolon. Run-on sentences can be short or long. A long sentence isn’t necessarily a run-on sentence.To avoid run-on sentences, see if there is more than one idea communicated by two or more independent clauses. In our examples, there are two complete sentences:Example:Example:Both sentences are complete ideas by themselves; therefore, use a semicolon or a period to indicate that they are separate independent clauses.Using “could of” instead of “could have”“Could have” is always correct; “could of” never is. Writers probably make this grammar gaffe because, when we speak, the contraction “could’ve” sounds an awful lot like “could of.”TautologiesTautologies express the same thing twice with different words. In our example, the word “made” implies that Jack used his own two hands to create the pail. The prepositional phrase “with his own hands” creates a redundancy. Once you know what they are, it’s fun to discover tautologies: dilapidated ruins, close proximity, added bonus, large crowd...The list goes on and on!After reading through this list of common grammatical mistakes, you might be wondering how to remember all these rules as you write.
